Description: Small drab ware pottery bowl with flat base and convex sides, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and interior with red-brown abstract decoration on a dark ground.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Walter B Emery
Curator's comments: Published in: Regulski, I. (ed.), 2022. Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt, p. 149
Exhibition history: 2022-2023 13 Oct-19 Feb, London, BM, Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt
